overview:
1st4buyers was established in 2007 with a core belief that we could bring products to UK and international consumers at great prices and with outstanding Customer Service. Since our inception we have scoured the international market place to look for products with a difference to introduce to consumers on a larger scale, we also look for hard to get hold of products, and complement this with a range of every day products.

Our Mission is to continuously bring the greatest products to the consumer first.
